item.title: 帽子、T恤衫和玩偶反映了即将卸任的墨西哥总统在即将举行的选举中的重要地位

item.title: 周二，美国多个州举行初选，总统候选人的年龄成为全国选民共同关心的问题，选民对乔-拜登和唐纳德-特朗普的年龄表示担忧。
item.description:
The age of presidential candidates was an issue shared by voters across the country on Tuesday as several states held primaries, with voters voicing concerns about the ages of both Joe Biden and Donald Trump. pic.twitter.com/a1Sull8Oae

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 斯科特-福里（Scott Foley）说，他在《费利西蒂》（Felicity）中饰演的诺埃尔-克莱恩（Noel Crane）一炮而红，这让他能够在《丑闻》（Scandal）和现在的《巴士上的女孩》（The Girls on the Bus）等剧中扮演的角色给观众带来惊喜。
item.description:
Scott Foley says his breakout role playing Noel Crane on "Felicity" allows him to surprise audiences with his characters on shows like "Scandal" and now "The Girls on the Bus." pic.twitter.com/8oohgubgBJ

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 19, 2024

item.title: 许多美国人对总统复选缺乏兴趣，这提高了人们对主要政党候选人之外的其他候选人的兴趣，小罗伯特-肯尼迪（Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
item.description:
The lack of excitement many Americans feel about a presidential rematch has heightened interest in alternatives to the major-party candidates, none more so than Robert F. Kennedy Jr., whose famous name has helped him build buzz for his independent bid. pic.twitter.com/ms9j6CzuwU

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 19, 2024

item.title: 杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）说，学习新的体能技能让他在 "公路之家"（Road House）中的角色变得更有魅力。杰克-吉伦哈尔在片中饰演一名前终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）拳手，他试图摆脱黑暗的过去和对暴力的嗜好。

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 19, 2024
